TopicTitle: My mission reports, for lacking of better names.

Articles.Content:
Hey, I've been writing abot my progression on KSP, my program actually called KSP for lack of a better name, I've only got two post so far that were recalling missions already past, and another post organized with a bunch of mods used in this game. Most notably are Kerbal Construction Time, combined with Remote Tech, TAC Life Support, Scan SAT, Deadly Reentry and of course, FAR. All of these combined for a more immerssive and realistic challenge.

Lately I've been very busy with overall updating related to the version, grabbing new mods, makings some adjustments etc.

Hope you check it out and like. Oh by the way, this is also my first post on this forum, so its more like introductory thread. However I've been around here reading all this stuff for quite a while that I already feel very familiar.Cheers

http://gfurst.wordpress.com/category/gaming/ksp-gaming/

Hey guys, just bumping this up to show a mission I did on video, mostly on IVA, with some bad voice over and editing.

Let me know what you think and how I can improve for next time.
